item.description:
Well, this isn't the nerdiest event, but the Marketing Manager for the Leadership Circle and Midlevel Giving for WGBH and WGBY invited me, and I can't think of anyone I'd rather go with than a bunch of nerds.

Live music from Bobby Sanabria y Quarteto Aché and Mango Blue, as well as dance performance and instruction. Plus, get a sneak preview of highlights from Latin Music USA, WGBH’s two-part, four-hour series on the rise of new American music forged from powerful Latin roots. Free parking, refreshments, and a cash bar.


FYI - u must pre-purchase a $25 ticket. I'll meet everyone at the inside entrance and will email all who sign up my cell, so no one feels lost. Those that know me, know I will be proudly holding up my meetup sign :) DO NOT SIGN UP AS A "YES" UNTIL U PURCHASE UR TIX!
http://www.wgbh.org/s...

The cut off date to RSVP as part of Nerd fun is the day before at 5pm (Thurs, October 1st) so I have time to email my cell and print out my final count.
item.name: Latin Music USA Premiere Party at WGBH's Brighton Studios
